doc:
Tom Davis (comedian) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Davis_(comedian) 0 Thomas James "Tom" Davis (August 13, 1952 – July 19, 2012) was an American writer, comedian, and author. He is best known for his comedy partnership with Al Franken, as half of the comedy duo "Franken Davis" on the Saturday Night Live television show on NBC. Thomas_James_"_Tom_"_Davis ( August_13_,_1952 – July_19_,_2012 ) was an_American_writer , comedian , and author . He is_best_known for his_comedy_partnership with Al_Franken , as half of the_comedy_duo " Franken_ " on the_Saturday_Night_Live_television_show on NBC .
